meta.name: Channel banks
meta.brief: A sparse series of channel banks.

meta.name: Channel Bank
meta.brief: A single channel bank, holding up to 128 Channels.

meta.name: Channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single FM or DMR channel.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the reception frequency.
meta.description: Frequency is specified in 10Hz.

meta.name: TX Frequency Offset
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit frequency offset.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in 10Hz. The offset direction is stored separately.

meta.name: Repeater direction
meta.brief: Specifies the offset direction for the repeater mode.

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.brief: Specifies the bandwidth of the FM channel. DMR channels are always 12.5kHz wide.

meta.name: Transmit power
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit power of the channel.

meta.name: Channel mode
meta.brief: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Enable RX only
meta.brief: If enabled, no transmission is possible on this channel.

meta.name: Swap RX/TX frequencies
meta.brief: Also swaps signaling.

meta.name: TX DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: RX DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: Custom CTCSS frequency
meta.brief: Specifies a custom CTCSS frequency in 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Two-tone decode index
meta.brief: Specifies the two-tone decode index.

meta.name: Transmit contact index
meta.brief: Contact index, 0-based.

meta.name: FM PTT ID transmission mode
meta.brief: Specifies when to transmit the FM PTT id.

meta.name: Admit Criterium
meta.brief: This is a mess. Similar admid criteria for FM and DMR are encoded differently. E.g., channel free and different CC/tone.

item.name: Channel Free
item.description: DMR: channel Free, FM: different CTCSS/DCS tone.

item.name: Different color code
item.description: DMR: different CC; FM: channel free

meta.name: Scan list index
meta.brief: Scan list index, 0-based. 0xff = None
meta.description: None = 0xff.

meta.name: Group List index
meta.brief: Specifies the group list 0-based index. 0xff = None.
meta.description: A 0-based index of the group list. If not set, 0xff.

meta.name: Two-tone Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: Five-tone Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: DTMF Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based.

meta.name: AES encryption key index
meta.brief: Index + 1, 0=Off.

meta.name: Exclude Channel from Roaming
meta.brief: If enabled, the channel gets excluded from roaming.

meta.name: Enable Simplex
meta.brief: Enables the simplex mode.
meta.description: That is, RX = TX frequency.

meta.name: DMR APRS channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based DMR APRS channel setting index. A value in [0,7].

meta.name: Frequency correction
meta.brief: Specifies the frequency correction in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Advanced Encryption Type
meta.brief: Only relevant, if advanced encryption is enabled.

meta.name: Auto Scan
meta.brief: Enables auto scan.

meta.name: Disable Data ACK
meta.brief: Disables data ACK.

meta.name: FM ARPS Frequency Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the FM APRS frequency.

meta.name: ARC4 Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the ARC4 key index (if ARC4 is enabled).
meta.description: Valid values are 1-255, 0=Off.

meta.name: Channel extension banks
meta.brief: A series of channel extension banks corresponding to each encoded channel bank.

meta.name: Channel extension bank
meta.brief: Encodes several channel extensions corresponding to each encoded channel.

meta.name: Channel extension
meta.brief: Encodes additional channel information.

meta.name: 5 Tone PTT ID index BOT
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the begin-of-transmission 5 tone PTT ID to send.
meta.description: The index is 0-based. Index 64h means "custom".

meta.name: 5 Tone PTT ID index EOT
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the 5 tone end-of-transmission PTT ID to send.
meta.description: The index is 0-based. The index 64h means "custom".

meta.name: VFO Channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single FM or DMR VFO channel.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the reception frequency.
meta.description: Frequency is specified in 10Hz.

meta.name: TX Frequency Offset
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit frequency offset.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in 10Hz. The offset direction is stored separately.

meta.name: Repeater direction
meta.brief: Specifies the offset direction for the repeater mode.

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.brief: Specifies the bandwidth of the FM channel. DMR channels are always 12.5kHz wide.

meta.name: Transmit power
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit power of the channel.

meta.name: Channel mode
meta.brief: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Enable RX only
meta.brief: If enabled, no transmission is possible on this channel.

meta.name: Swap RX/TX frequencies
meta.brief: Also swaps signaling.

meta.name: TX DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: RX DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: Custom CTCSS frequency
meta.brief: Specifies a custom CTCSS frequency in 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Two-tone decode index
meta.brief: Specifies the two-tone decode index.

meta.name: Transmit contact index
meta.brief: Contact index, 0-based.

meta.name: FM PTT ID transmission mode
meta.brief: Specifies when to transmit the FM PTT id.

meta.name: Admit Criterium
meta.brief: This is a mess. Similar admid criteria for FM and DMR are encoded differently. E.g., channel free and different CC/tone.

item.name: Channel Free
item.description: DMR: channel Free, FM: different CTCSS/DCS tone.

item.name: Different color code
item.description: DMR: different CC; FM: channel free

meta.name: Scan list index
meta.brief: Scan list index, 0-based. 0xff = None
meta.description: None = 0xff.

meta.name: Group List index
meta.brief: Specifies the group list 0-based index. 0xff = None.
meta.description: A 0-based index of the group list. If not set, 0xff.

meta.name: Two-tone Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: Five-tone Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: DTMF Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based.

meta.name: AES encryption key index
meta.brief: Index + 1, 0=Off.

meta.name: Exclude Channel from Roaming
meta.brief: If enabled, the channel gets excluded from roaming.

meta.name: Enable Simplex
meta.brief: Enables the simplex mode.
meta.description: That is, RX = TX frequency.

meta.name: DMR APRS channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based DMR APRS channel setting index. A value in [0,7].

meta.name: Frequency correction
meta.brief: Specifies the frequency correction in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Advanced Encryption Type
meta.brief: Only relevant, if advanced encryption is enabled.

meta.name: Auto Scan
meta.brief: Enables auto scan.

meta.name: Disable Data ACK
meta.brief: Disables data ACK.

meta.name: FM ARPS Frequency Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the FM APRS frequency.

meta.name: ARC4 Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the ARC4 key index (if ARC4 is enabled).
meta.description: Valid values are 1-255, 0=Off.

meta.name: VFO Channel extension
meta.brief: Encodes additional channel information.

meta.name: 5 Tone PTT ID index BOT
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the begin-of-transmission 5 tone PTT ID to send.
meta.description: The index is 0-based. Index 64h means "custom".

meta.name: 5 Tone PTT ID index EOT
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the 5 tone end-of-transmission PTT ID to send.
meta.description: The index is 0-based. The index 64h means "custom".

meta.name: Zone channel indices
meta.brief: A fixed sized list of channel indices for the zone.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based channel index.
meta.description: If unset, value is ffffh.

meta.name: Roaming channel bank
meta.brief: Encodes a bank of up to 250 roaming channels.

meta.name: Roaming channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single roaming channel.

meta.name: RX frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the RX frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: TX frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the transmit frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is encoded in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Color code override
meta.brief: Specifies the color code to override the current channels setting with.
meta.description: If set to 16 (10h), there is no override.

meta.name: Time slot override
meta.brief: Specifies if and how the current channels time slot gets overridden.

item.name: None
item.description: If selected, the current channels time slot will not be overridden.

meta.name: Roaming channel bit
meta.brief: Single bit encoding whether a roaming channel is valid.

meta.name: Roaming zone enable bit
meta.brief: Enables a single roaming zone.

meta.name: Roaming zone bank
meta.brief: A collection of up to 64 roaming zones.

meta.name: Roaming zone
meta.brief: Encodes a single roaming.

meta.name: Roaming channel index
meta.brief: 0-based index.
meta.description: If set to 0xff, disabled.

meta.name: Name
meta.brief: Specifies the name of the roaming zone.

meta.name: Primary Priority Channel Index
meta.brief: Index +1, 0=selected. ffff=none.

meta.name: Secondary Priority Channel Index
meta.brief: Index +1, 0=selected, ffff=none

meta.name: Primary Look Back Time
meta.brief: in 10sec.

meta.name: Secondary Look Back Time
meta.brief: in 10sec.

meta.name: Dropout delay
meta.brief: in 10sec.

meta.name: Dwell time
meta.brief: in 10sec.

meta.name: Channel Index
meta.brief: Index 0-based, ffffh=disabled

meta.name: Message enable byte
meta.brief: Enables a specific message.

meta.name: Tone duration
meta.brief: Duration is encoded in ms. Valid values are 30ms - 100ms.

meta.name: ID
meta.brief: Up to 40 digits

meta.name: Digit
meta.brief: Encodes a single ID digit.

meta.name: Symbol Interval
meta.brief: Valid values 0-15.

meta.name: Group Code
meta.brief: Valid values 0-15

meta.name: Tone Delay
meta.brief: Tone delay in 10ms.

meta.name: First digit duration
meta.brief: Duration in 10ms.

meta.name: Auto Reset Time
meta.brief: In multiple of 10s.

meta.name: Post-tone delay.
meta.brief: Delay in multiple of 10ms before EOT.

meta.name: PTT Id Pause
meta.brief: Pause between PTT Id transmissions in multiple of 10s.

meta.name: D-Code Pause
meta.brief: In seconds.

meta.name: 2-Tone Id
meta.brief: Encodes a single 2-tone id.

meta.name: First tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Second tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the tone frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Name
meta.brief: The name of the id.

meta.name: 2-Tone Id bitmap
meta.brief: Specifies, which 2-tone id is valid.

meta.name: First tone duration
meta.brief: Encodes the first tone duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 500-10000ms.

meta.name: Second tone duration
meta.brief: Specifies the second tone duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 500ms - 10000ms.

meta.name: Long tone duration
meta.brief: Encodes the duration in terms of 100ms. Valid values are 500 - 10000ms.

meta.name: Gap duration
meta.brief: Encodes the gap duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 0 - 2000ms.

meta.name: Reset period
meta.brief: Encodes the reset period in seconds. Valid values are 0 - 250s.

meta.name: Side tone
meta.brief: Enables side tone.

meta.name: Hidden zone bit
meta.brief: If enabled, the corresponding zone is hidden.

meta.name: DTMF/5Tomn id index
meta.brief: 0-based index of DTMF or 5-tone id.

meta.name: Alarm duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm TX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm transmit duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm RX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm RX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm channel index
meta.brief: Must be a 0-based index to an analog channel.

meta.name: Emergency cycle
meta.brief: 0 = continuous, otherwise count 1...255.

meta.name: Alarm duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm TX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the TX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm RX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm RX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the index the alarm channel. Must be an index of a DMR channel.

meta.name: Emergency cycle
meta.brief: 0=Continous, else number of cycles.

meta.name: Voice switch broadcast
meta.brief: Some bull shit. Likely a period in minutes+1. Of regular transmissions. That is 0=1m, 1=2m,...

meta.name: Area switch broadcast
meta.brief: Uh, the engineerd absolutely gave a shit. This is some other time interval. This time in seconds+1. That is, 0=1s, 1=2s, ...

meta.name: DMR Encryption Id
meta.brief: ffffh=Invalid.

meta.name: 2-Tone functions
meta.brief: Encodes up to 16 two-tone functions.

meta.name: First tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency of the first tone.
meta.description: The value is stored in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Second tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency of the second tone.
meta.description: The value is stored in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Key Id
meta.brief: 1-based key Id. 0=Off.

meta.name: Key Size
meta.brief: Specifies the key-size in nibbles (multiples of 4bit).

meta.name: Zone A & B channels
meta.brief: Encodes for each zone the A & B channel.

meta.name: Channel indices
meta.brief: Channel A indices for all possible zones.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: Specifies a 0-based channel index. No special values.

meta.name: Channel indices
meta.brief: Channel B indices for all possible zones.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: Specifies a 0-based channel index. No special values.

meta.name: DTMF Ids
meta.brief: Encodes DTMF PTT ids.

meta.name: DTMF digit
meta.brief: Valid values 0h - fh. If not set, ffh.
